com.redpill_linpro.mule.jsonwebtoken

Class JSONWebTokenConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redpill_linpro.mule.jsonwebtoken.JSONWebTokenConnector

  • @Connector(name="jwt",
           friendlyName="JSON Web Token",
           minMuleVersion="3.8.0",
           description="JSON Web Token decoding and validation")
public class JSONWebTokenConnector
extends Object
    JSON Web Token Connector for Mule Runtime.
    Author:
    Redpill Linpro

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        @Processor(friendlyName="Decode JWT")
 @Mime(value="application/json")
public org.mule.module.json.JsonData decode(@Default(value="#[message.inboundProperties[\'Authorization\']]")
                                                                                                                   String token,
                                                                                                                   @Default(value="false")
                                                                                                                   Boolean validateSignature)
                                                                                                            throws IOException
        Decode JWT into a JsonData
        Parameters:
        token - The JSON Web Token to decode
        validateSignature - If the JSON Web Token should be validated before decoded
        Returns:
        A JSONObject containing the claims from the JSON Web Token payload
        Throws:
        IOException - If we are not able to parse the JSON Web Token header or payload.

      • signatureIsValid

        @Filter
public boolean signatureIsValid(@Default(value="#[message.inboundProperties[\'Authorization\']]")
                                        String token)
                                 throws IOException
        Validates a JWT
        Parameters:
        token - The JSON Web Token to validate
        Returns:
        true if the provide token has none or valid signature
        Throws:
        IOException - If we are not able to parse the JSON Web Token header or payload.
